data.name: dashboard_as_gift
data.description: Drill for transferring emotional design sensibility into functional UI. Use when redesigning dashboards or data-heavy screens.

items.text: Define clear emotion target (calm, confident, excited, cared-for)
Create one hero moment - one metric or insight that feels celebrated
Apply softer but intentional contrast (not flat, not shouty)
Write micro-copy that sounds human (not SaaS robot)
Add one tiny delight detail (hover, easter-egg, killer empty state)
